Alright guys, I did the math. If there’s 100 girls, with an average of about 30 times each, then that’s 3,000 times he needs to have sex. 3,000 divided by 365 is about 8, so this dude needs to have sex 8 times a day, *minimum*, in order to not go to hell. It’s displayed that his endurance so far is about 6-7, but at this rate he may also be extending his maximum number of daily orgasms. 
In conclusion, this guy might actually do it, but it’s gonna be one hell of a clutch on his part.
